Description: When his music career becomes stagnant, thirty-year-old Theo Vilmos seeks solace in a secluded cabin in the woods, where he discovers an old book written by his great-uncle that transports him into the terrifying world of Faerie, a strange and dangerous place that holds the key to his destiny.
